item.title: Best Extended Car Warranties of 2025
item.description: Money reviews the best extended car warranties and offers guidance on who might want to buy one.

item.title: Despite Economic Jitters, Employers Plan to Dole Out 3.5% Raises Next Year
item.description: Workers in communications, insurance and financial services could see the biggest bumps in pay.

item.title: Will the Fed Lower Rates in September? Experts Say Weak Jobs Report ‘Cements’ a Cut
item.description: Analysts expect the Fed to lower rates at its upcoming meeting after a weaker-than-expected August jobs report.

item.title: Are These the Next Cryptos to 1,000x?
item.description: Learn how to find cryptocurrencies that could possibly grow by 1,000x.

item.title: A Record Number of Americans Are in the 401(k) Millionaire Club
item.description: 595,000 401(k) accounts hit $1 million in Q2 as market gains boosted retirement savings balances.
